ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] RE: HER-2070 or: Any news on the Cookie Monster bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Many thanks for this, Noah. I m having trouble with the latest H3 build, though (even just the master branch without these changes): it s consistently failing
